intro: GET READY FOR THE MONSTER CON!
description:
"Monster Prom 4: Monster Con" tries to answer one of life’s most important questions: “Can you find love at the nerdiest convention ever”?

After going on a wild ride with “Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip”, Monster Con returns to the classic dating sim formula of the previous games in the franchise: multiplayer narrative adventures full of colorful characters and hilarious dialogue!

This sequel takes you to a wacky new setting: the Monster Con, a massive convention filled with video games, comic books, anime… and more than a few paranormal activities. Meet four brand new characters who might win your heart by the end of the Con, and let your old friends Liam and Zoe introduce you to the Con’s crazy staff and visitors: annoying streamers, famous authors, washed-up actors, networking game developers… and so many more! 

Monster Con brings back the franchise’s trademark humor and style, and adds entirely new mechanics: during the Con, you’ll get a chance to build your own comic book and read it at the end of the run. And of course, there’s romance to be found: get close to your favorite character and muster the courage to ask them out to the Con afterparty!

But that’s not all! The XXL version includes a whopping FOUR of the DLC playable characters: Damien, Valerie, Aaravi, and Milo!

Monster Con has everything you love about the "Monster Prom" formula, so what are you waiting for? Unleash your inner nerd and make the right choices to find a date at the craziest monster-filled convention you'll ever visit! ;)
